game.text: Enrol at the Big Brain Academy for the ultimate mental exercise regime. Find out how fast you can think, test your ability for logical thought and turn that dull daily train journey into an intellectual keep-fit session. With Big Brain Academy you can have fun while giving your brain a rigorous workout, playing across a series of mini-games designed to stimulate your mind. You can practice the challenges, go straight for the test, or even take on your friends.
